name: MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies
description:
The prestigious Gamicademi – a school of fading glory. To put it back in the spotlight, Blanc and friends decide to film a zombie flick on campus. All’s quiet on the set until real zombies start crawling out of the woodworks! Now they’ve got to send these zombies to detention in this hack ‘n’ slash or else be history!

Key Features
1. Rack up crazy combos against zombie hordes with a two-person tag team!
2. Team up with up to 3 other friends in online Multiplay mode to take on multiplayer quests, with new quests updated daily!
3. More characters join the battle with their own fighting styles, including Plutia, Peashy, Uzume, and a new playable character – Tamsoft!
4. Dress to kill with customizable equipment, and accessories that can be put pretty much anywhere


1 player(s)
Ad Hoc Mode 2-4 Players
Network Players 2-4
896KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
